title: ID Franklyn Rodgers sans serif
content:
Hello. Would anyone like to hazard a guess as to what this typeface is? I'm sure it must be an obvious one but I can't find an exact match! Sorry for the link, I couldn't get my image to attach.

[http://alexbroadhurst.com/franklyn\_rodgers.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144956/http:/alexbroadhurst.com/franklyn_rodgers.jpg)

Thanks
author: furryvision
